description: This file contains unit tests for the TextFragment and TextSegmentIterator classes, verifying string manipulation and iteration functionalities within the WPEFramework Core namespace.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a fragment of text, supporting operations like trimming, comparison, and searching.

classes.name: TextSegmentIterator
classes.description: An iterator class for traversing segments within a TextFragment based on delimiters.

methods.name: simple_textfragement
methods.description: Unit test function that verifies various functionalities of TextFragment and TextSegmentIterator.
